title: Introduction
body: This module introduces the fundamental concepts of Artificial Intelligence. We will discuss the concept of machine intelligence and how computers learn from data.
instruction: {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}, please scroll down to start your learning journey.

title: Ethical and Legal Considerations
body: Tis module presents some ethical and legal challenges in the development and usage of Artificial Intelligence. We will discuss biases and potential discrimination, as well as legal aspects such as copyright and data protection.
instruction: {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}, please scroll down to start your learning journey.
